definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: He had followed her into the shrubbery with no idea of trying it.
sentences.chinese: 他跟她走進小樹林時，並沒想到要試一試。

sentences.english: My wood makes me feel heavy.
sentences.chinese: 我的小樹林讓我覺得沉重。

sentences.english: There is a small woods a lot of .
sentences.chinese: 有一個小樹林，裏面有許多美麗的鳥兒。

sentences.english: We will have our picnic there in the small woods by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在湖邊的小樹林裏野餐。

sentences.english: Cows graze in droves on grass that grows on grooves in groves.
sentences.chinese: 成羣的奶牛在小樹林裏喫溝邊的草。

sentences.english: Tell me, friend, how far is the grove.
sentences.chinese: 朋友，告訴我，離小樹林有多遠。

sentences.english: The gales, that lately sighed along the grove.
sentences.chinese: 順着小樹林不久前大風嘆口氣。

sentences.english: She had a good turnout at an initial information meeting to present the idea to small woodlot owners.
sentences.chinese: 她組織了一次構想說明會，很多小樹林主都出席了。

sentences.english: The children enter the small woods for a very excited.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們一進入小樹林就非常興奮。

sentences.english: I used to take a walk in the quiet grove.
sentences.chinese: 過去我常在那安靜的小樹林裏散步。

sentences.english: Cows graze in groves on grass which grows in grooves in groves.
sentences.chinese: 在小樹林中，母牛喫在溝槽中生長的小草。

sentences.english: Cows graze in droves on the grass that grows on grooves in groves.
sentences.chinese: 成羣的奶牛在小樹林裏喫溝邊的草。

sentences.english: The trail that cut across the woods was often trodden.
sentences.chinese: 橫穿小樹林的那條小徑常有人走。

sentences.english: They searched the woods for the little boy.
sentences.chinese: 他們搜查了小樹林，尋找那個小男孩。

sentences.english: Throughasmall forest, past a cemetery to see a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 穿過小樹林，走過一片墓地就看到了一個水坑。

sentences.english: In the foreground lay golden fields and copses glittering in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色的田野和小樹林在近處閃閃發亮。

definition: body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
to lose one's head out of fear (idiom)
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
